siteMetadata.title: instrumaniak
siteMetadata.description: A blog & personal site of Raziur Rahman

frontmatter.title: How I got a web developer job
frontmatter.blurb: Ever since I started working as a web developer, many people asked me why & how I became a developer. Here I take some time to reflect on my journy to become a web developer.

frontmatter.title: Making of the track - Flow
frontmatter.blurb: How the music was produced & some thoughts behind this project.

frontmatter.title: Filter/Search a data table
frontmatter.blurb: This is a little project, I did to brush up my JavaScript and CSS coding skills. In this project you can interactively filter/search the data of a html table.

frontmatter.title: CSS Button
frontmatter.blurb: As I was focusing more on JavaScript, I soon realized that without practice I am getting weak at CSS. So took sometime to brush up my CSS basics by styling some buttons.

frontmatter.title: JavaScript workout
frontmatter.blurb: Some freeCodeCamp coding exercises that I solved to improve my skill.

frontmatter.title: Scraping web data right from the browser console
frontmatter.blurb: Around this time, I have been learning JavaScript quite seriously and trying to use it for anything outside of my coding exercises.

frontmatter.title: Using Jekyll for blogging
frontmatter.blurb: I started to like static site generators and decided to host my blog on github pages.

frontmatter.title: Noise removal tips for single coil Guitar pickup
Using spreadsheet as a simple database
frontmatter.blurb: I wasn't a big fan of spreadsheets but that changed when I started using it to keep track of some data.

frontmatter.title: How I got started with Git
frontmatter.blurb: I liked the idea of version control but as a beginner typing git commands wasn't intuitive so I used a GUI tool.

frontmatter.title: Making of the track - Carbon
frontmatter.blurb: How I made a music track using only free tools available on a Linux distro and what was my workflow for music and artwork production.

frontmatter.title: Exploring AVLinux
frontmatter.blurb: I wanted to try out AVLinux for music production using free tools. Here I also look back on how I got into Linux and music making.

frontmatter.title: Using LADSPA plugins as VST plugins
frontmatter.blurb: I noticed that windows version of Audacity can load LADSPA plugins so I thought what If I could also use these as VST plugins.

frontmatter.title: Making of the Album - instrumania
frontmatter.blurb: How the music was produced, some thoughts & motivation for doing this project.
